name: Medieval Politics
description:
Play as King Gary, a medieval British monarch who hates his job. Gary was once a happy peasant, content to farm all his life, but then his neighbors decided to  make him run in the new election for a king. After literally winning by a landslide, King Gary now has to make the really tough decisions all British kings have to make, all while trying to get kicked out of office so he can go back to being a peasant.

*IMPORTANT*

Occasionally the wealth and love will say NAN (Not A Number).

 I don’t know why this happens, please just reload the page again.

Instructions are in-game.
